entry.title: Champagne Glasses -x 4 - Miniature
entry.summary:
Vendor: Miniature
Type: Dollhouse Accessories
Price: 7.90

Dollhouse Miniature Set of 4 x Champagne Flutes - this is a 1:12 scale dollhouse miniature accessory.

Raise a toast in style with our luxurious set of 4 miniature filled champagne flutes.  Perfect for celebrating life's special moments, these glasses will add a touch of sophistication to any gathering. Cheers!

Note that these can be quite frustrating to stand upright due to their tiny base. It's recommended to use a touch of tacky glue or similar to help keep them standing upright. 

Measurement of each glass approximately 2.5 cm high.

Made of acrylic and filled with "champagne-like" resin.

Please note that other figures, accessories and items displayed in images are not included, but are present for styling purposes only.

This is not designed to be a children's toy, but rather a collector's item. Suitable for adult collector's, diorama's etc.

entry.title: Noodle Soup - Miniature
entry.summary:
Vendor: Miniature
Type: Dollhouse Accessories
Price: 8.50

Dollhouse Miniature Noodle Soup - this is a dollshouse miniature item in 1:12 scale.

Looks so real and delectable! The perfect dish to add this to your miniature restaurant, takeaway bar, or your dollhouse kitchen table. 

Note that chopsticks are attached to the bowl and are not intended to be removed. All items fixed in plate. The bowl has a rooster picture on the side. 

Measurements: Bowl measures 2.7 cm diameter 

Not made to be a toy, but recommended as a collector's miniature item

As this item is hand made, each item is unique and there may be very slight differences from the photograph image in styling, placement or colouring of the item, but it will still retain it's high quality and uniqueness. 

Other items are not included, but are in images for styling purpose.

See more of our Miniature Food Accessories of all kinds

entry.title: Udong Noodle Soup - Miniature
entry.summary:
Vendor: Miniature
Type: Dollhouse Accessories
Price: 8.50

Dollhouse Miniature Udong Noodle Soup - This is a miniature 1:12 scale replica.

Add a touch of authenticity to your miniature Asian restaurant or dollhouse takeaway night with this delectable looking noodle soup. 

Not made to be a toy, but recommended as a collector's miniature item

Measurements: approx 2.5 cm diameter.

Note that these are handmade in batches. This means that some bento boxes may vary slightly from the image seen in photographs in colour, texture of placement of items.

Made of polymer clay. All pieces are fixed, so there is no danger of losing any little pieces. 

Not suitable for young children.  It has a similar consistency to a ceramic item.

Other items are not included, but are in images for styling purpose.

See more of our Miniature Food Accessories of all kinds

entry.title: Pint of Beer x 1 - Miniature
entry.summary:
Vendor: Miniature
Type: Dollhouse Accessories
Price: 6.50

Miniature Pint of Beer x 1- Dollshouse miniature 1:12 scale item.

Looking to add some character to your mini pub? Look no further than our miniature pint of beer with realistic-looking froth on top. Perfect for adding detail to any miniature scene. 

Measurements: approx 1.6 cm high. 1 cm wide.

Made of resin and acrylic.

This sale is for 1 x beer in mug.

No figures or other accessories are included.  However, other items that may appear in images can often be found in store for individual sale.

Not suitable for children as this product is not made to be a toy.  Recommended use as a display item only for adult miniaturists.

Recommended Age 14+

entry.title: Bird of Paradise Plant in Pot - Miniature
entry.summary:
Vendor: Miniature
Type: Miniature
Price: 5.50

Dollhouse Miniature 1:12 scale Bird of Paradise Plant in pot - this is a dollhouse 1:12 scale miniature accessory.

The perfect addition to your miniature florist shop!  Place it on your miniature kitchen counter top to bring some sunshine to your scene.

Measurements:  2.5 to 4cm high (depending on plant chosen)

Each item is uniquely handmade, so there may be very minor variations in colour, size and shape from the photograph shown, but each item is assuredly of the highest quality and hand-crafted.

This sale is for 1 x plant in pot 

Other items seen in images are not included but are for styling purposes only.

This is not a intended to be a toy. Recommended for adult miniature enthusiasts as a display item in a diorama or miniature scene.

Not Suitable for children.

entry.title: Yellow Cafe Chairs x 4 - Metal - Miniature
entry.summary:
Vendor: Miniature
Type: Miniature
Price: 32.90

Dollhouse Miniature Set of Yellow Metal Cafe-style chairs - 4 in total - Miniature Dollhouse furniture 1:12

Please note that the painting on these is not perfect. There are slight irregularities.

Bring the sunshine into your cafe or kitchen with these colourful yellow chairs! Made of metal, they're the perfect miniature addition for a touch of fun. A great way to brighten your miniature scene.

Made of metal

This sale is for 4 x metal miniature chairs. Only sold as a set of 4.

This furniture set is suitable for a 1:12 scale dollhouse accessory. 

Please note this is a miniature, not a toy and is recommended for adult collector's of miniatures only.

No figures or other accessories included. Accessories seen in the images may also be available in store for separate purchase (depending on stock availability at the time)

entry.title: Safari Animal Set of 6 - - 2.5 cm high - Mini toys
entry.summary:
Vendor: Miniature
Type: Dollhouse Accessories
Price: 10.90

Miniature Safari Set of 6 figurines - Suitable as a 1:12 scale dollhouse toy

The miniature nursery has gone wild! This fabulous set of 6 safari animals make the perfect toy animal figurines for your dollhouse scene.  Pop them in a toy basket or toy chest, or place them on shelves around the room. They'll add colour and adventure to your scene.  These are about the size of a paper clip.

The safari set includes an elephant, rhino, hippo, zebra, giraffe and lion.

  • Great to add to a Toy Shop scene
  • Add some to Santa's Toy Workshop
  • They'd make a great child's favourite toy in a nursery scene

These are ideal as a miniature nursery toy or as ornaments on a shelf. 

Measurements: from 2 cm to 3 cm in height, depending on animal.

  • These are made of plastic and are a flexible rubbery consistency
  • Non-toxic and BPA free

This sale is for 6 x figures only. Other accessories and items scene in images are for display purposes only, but may be available for purchase in store also (depending on stock availibility)

Recommended for age 14+ Not designed for small children

See more Dollhouse Miniature Nursery themed accessories in store
